title: Brass/Percussion Fund
description: To provide general discretionary support for the Brass / Percussion Department at the College of Music at CU Boulder.
marketingContent: Gifts to the Brass/Percussion Department directly enhance student opportunities and experiences in the College of Music.  Donor support provides merit-based scholarship for outstanding performers, and enrichment experiences including master classes, travel for professional development, and curation of the brass/percussion instruments and music library.
